name: Pimp My Bot
description:
Basically, it's a game where you repair robots, based on a client's demand with whatever they brings and whatever you happen to have in your workshop.
Now show us how you would Pimp My Bot!

"Yo dawg !
We repaired your robot!
We added a bike wheel for leg, a keyboard and a chainsaw for arms and a minibar for the body.
Also, I heard you liked beer. So we put a minibar on the minibar so you can drink while you drink!
Enjoy your brand new Bot' !"

Credits :

- Sacha CHOUERY (Design/Art/Sounds)
- Pierrick FABRE (Design/Art/Programming)
- Arthur HAYE (Design/Project Management/Programming)
- Nathan TARRIEU (Design/UI/Programming)

Game submitted for the Global Game Jam 2020 at Champollion University (Albi, France).
